trans-unit.source: The type of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.
In many cases the data that you work with is a collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，你使用的数据是对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, a common scenario in data binding is to use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> to display a collection of records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，数据绑定中的一个常见方案是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>以显示记录的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can enumerate over any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 你可以枚举任何集合可实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。

trans-unit.source: However, to set up dynamic bindings so that insertions or deletions in the collection update the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] automatically, the collection must implement the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: 但是，若要设置动态绑定，使插入或删除集合中的更新[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]集合必须实现自动<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface exposes the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event, an event that should be raised whenever the underlying collection changes.
trans-unit.target: 此接口公开<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件，每当基础集合更改时将引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> class, which is a built-in implementation of a data collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>类，该类是数据集合可实现的内置实现<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>接口。

trans-unit.source: Before implementing your own collection, consider using <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> or one of the existing collection classes, such as <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>, among many others.
trans-unit.target: 在实施之前你自己的集合，请考虑使用<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>或一个现有集合类，如<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>， <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>，此外还有许多其他。

trans-unit.source: If you have an advanced scenario and want to implement your own collection, consider using <xref:System.Collections.IList>, which provides a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有高级的方案，并想要实现您自己的集合，请考虑使用<xref:System.Collections.IList>，它提供可按照索引单独访问的对象的非泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Implementing <xref:System.Collections.IList> provides the best performance with the data binding engine.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Collections.IList>与数据绑定引擎提供最佳性能。

trans-unit.source: To fully support transferring data values from binding source objects to binding targets, each object in your collection that supports bindable properties must implement an appropriate property changed notification mechanism such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全支持从绑定源对象到绑定目标传输的数据值，您支持可绑定属性的集合中每个对象必须实现适当的属性更改通知机制如<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>接口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"绑定到集合"[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Notes on XAML Usage
trans-unit.target: 有关 XAML 用法说明

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> can be used as a XAML object element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], in versions 3.0 and 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> 可以用作中的 XAML 对象元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，在版本 3.0 和 3.5。

trans-unit.source: However, the usage has substantial limitations.
trans-unit.target: 但是，使用情况有很大的局限性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> must be the root element, because the that must be used to specify the constrained type of the generic <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> is only supported on the object element for the root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> 因为，必须用于指定约束的泛型类型必须是根元素，<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>仅支持对象元素的根元素上。

trans-unit.source: You must declare an (which entails that the build action for this XAML file must be `Page` or some other build action that compiles the XAML).
trans-unit.target: 必须声明 (必须是此 XAML 文件的生成操作的需要`Page`或某些其他生成编译 XAML 的操作)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> is in a namespace and assembly that are not initially mapped to the default XML namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> 命名空间和程序集，最初未映射到默认 XML 命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: You must map a prefix for the namespace and assembly, and then use that prefix on the object element tag for <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 你必须映射的前缀的命名空间和程序集，，然后在对象元素标记上使用该前缀<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: A more straightforward way to use <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> capabilities from XAML in an application is to declare your own non-generic custom collection class that derives from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>, and constrains it to a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 更直接的方法，以使用<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>从 XAML 应用程序中的功能是声明您自己的自定义非泛型集合类派生自<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>，和约束到特定的类型。

trans-unit.source: Then map the assembly that contains this class, and reference it as an object element in your XAML.
trans-unit.target: 然后映射包含此类的程序集并作为对象元素在 XAML 中引用它。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class.
The collection from which the elements are copied.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified collection.
The elements are copied onto the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将元素复制到<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>与它们的集合的枚举器会读取相同的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="collection" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
The list from which the elements are copied.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified list.
The elements are copied onto the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the list.
trans-unit.target: 将元素复制到<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>以相同的顺序，将在读取列表的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="list" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
Disallows reentrant attempts to change this collection.
An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that can be used to dispose of the object.
The typical usage is to wrap an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.OnCollectionChanged%2A> call within a `using` scope, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 典型用法就是包装<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.OnCollectionChanged%2A>内调用`using`作用域，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: Checks for reentrant attempts to change this collection.

If there was a call to <see cref="M:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.BlockReentrancy" /> of which the <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> return value has not yet been disposed of.
Typically, this means when there are additional attempts to change this collection during a <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> event.
However, it depends on when derived classes choose to call <see cref="M:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.BlockReentrancy" />.
Removes all items from the collection.
The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared.
trans-unit.target: 正在清除列表时，基的类将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将引发<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is added, removed, changed, moved, or the entire list is refreshed.
The zero-based index at which <c>item</c> should be inserted.
The object to insert.
Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
The base class calls this method when an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合添加项时，基的类将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将引发<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.InsertItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.InsertItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基类。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.
The zero-based index specifying the new location of the item.
Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.
Subclasses can override the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.MoveItem%2A> method to provide custom behavior for this method.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写子类<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.MoveItem%2A>方法以便为此方法提供自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.
The zero-based index specifying the new location of the item.
Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.
This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将引发<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses can override this protected method to provide custom behavior for the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.Move%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 子类可以重写此受保护的方法，以提供自定义行为<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.Move%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> event with the provided arguments.
Properties and methods that modify this collection raise the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event through this `virtual` method.
trans-unit.target: 属性和方法以修改此集合引发<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>通过此事件`virtual`方法。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, either call the base implementation or use the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.BlockReentrancy%2A> method to handle reentrant collection changes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 在重写此方法，请调用基实现，或使用<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.BlockReentrancy%2A>更改方法以处理可重入的集合，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.PropertyChanged" /> event with the provided arguments.
Occurs when a property value changes.
The zero-based index of the element to remove.
Removes the item at the specified index of the collection.
The base class calls this method when an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除项时，基的类将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将引发<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基类。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
The new value for the element at the specified index.
Replaces the element at the specified index.
The base class calls this method when an item is set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 项设置集合中时，基的类将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将引发<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基类。
